page.title: 13GROUP THERAPY-GALSTON
page.content: If children or young adults are in court or home trouble it is the duty of the Social Worker to take the child into his/hers confidence and try to help the child to speak about their troubles. This is called I.T. or Intermediate Treatment.They introduce them to groups of children with similar promlems.They will help the chidren to talk amongst themselves and mend their ways.After a few weeks they will take them on outings to try and show them there is another side to life.Then they will write a report to the Children's Panel and hopefully re-integrate them successfully into their community.The police are happy with this method as it seems to help the crime rate in Galston which is below average for the region.The main crime is vandalism which is committed by the age group in the group therapy.
